profile.description:
I am 22 years old and I am from Piura, Peru. I am currently studying the seventh cycle of Information Systems Management. I work on my own projects on soccer data analysis and software development.

I am working on the creation of a sports prediction software, which uses the Python programming language implementing machine learning algorithms and data analysis to predict outcomes especially in soccer matches.

projects.first-project-description: This project demonstrates the potential of Python and Jupyter Notebook to analyze soccer data. The results of the analysis can be used by coaches, players, fans and other professionals to make better decisions.
projects.second-project-description: This project is a clone of Linktree, a popular tool for centralizing links in one place. Using HTML, CSS and Javascript, I developed this web application that allows you to create your own custom link page and share it with your audience.
projects.three-project-description: This password generator project is developed with HTML CSS and JavaScript. It has options for the length of the password, whether to include numbers, capital letters or symbols.
projects.four-project-description: This project consists of a landing page for a WhatsApp mass messaging platform. It provides information about the services offered, main features and prices.
